events.title: A politico-financial framework of the ‚ÄúAI tax‚Äù emerges as a response to the redistribution of income and employment
events.description: A politico-financial framework of the ‚ÄúAI tax‚Äù emerges as a response to the redistribution of income and employment. In the discourse of investors and authors at Citrini Research, the taxation of ‚Äúincremental/unforeseen‚Äù AI gains is discussed to compensate for job losses, shifting AI from a growth topic to one of fiscal and social ‚Äúhedging.‚Äù

events.title: The financial market begins to ‚Äúprice‚Äù AI as a risk to incumbent software rents, not just as a driver of CapEx
events.description: The financial market begins to ‚Äúprice‚Äù AI as a risk to incumbent software rents, not just as a driver of CapEx. The ‚ÄúAI scare trade‚Äù leads to sell-offs in software/payments and a historic decline in IBM following Anthropic‚Äôs announcement of Cobol modernization (an attack on legacy rent).

events.title: Employee liquidity becomes part of the ‚Äúmonetary infrastructure‚Äù of AI giants
events.description: Employee liquidity becomes part of the ‚Äúmonetary infrastructure‚Äù of AI giants. Anthropic launches a stock sale for current/former employees up to $6 billion (secondary market as a retention/redistribution mechanism).

events.title: Escalates the conflict of "acceptable borrowing" norms in the LLM industry (distillation/extraction)
events.description: Escalates the conflict of norms of ‚Äúacceptable borrowing‚Äù in the LLM industry (distillation/extraction). Anthropic claims that Chinese DeepSeek and MiniMax ‚Äúillegally extracted‚Äù results from their models. This increases pressure on informal norms of open-science/benchmarking and pushes towards ‚Äúborderline‚Äù protection practices (rate limits, watermarking, legal).

events.title: New protocols of coordination and trust are forming around agent systems, but failures of self-organization are being revealed
events.description: New protocols of coordination and trust are forming around agent systems, but failures of self-organization are being revealed. Research on the Moltbook/OpenClaw ecosystem shows the scale of ‚Äúagent-to-agent‚Äù interactions, but also spam/off-topic content, vulnerabilities, and the need for structural ‚Äúgovernance by design.‚Äù

events.title: Public counter-reaction to the quality of consumer-LLM is increasing
events.description: Public counter-reaction to the quality of consumer-LLMs is growing. The ‚ÄúQuitGPT‚Äù campaign (subscription cancellations due to disappointment in quality/style) signals erosion of trust in mass chat products without clear professional verification.

events.title: Regulatory pressure through real incidents turns "safety" into a mode of institutional control
events.description: Regulatory pressure through real incidents shifts "safety" into a mode of institutional control. Canada summons OpenAI over a ChatGPT user case followed by a mass shooting ‚Äî this is restructuring the institutions of accountability, disclosure, and interaction with law enforcement.

events.title: Military/government AI procurement becomes a battleground for rules of application
events.description: Military/government AI procurement becomes a battleground for rules of use. The CEO of Anthropic meets with the US Secretary of Defense amid a deadlock over contracts due to "guardrails" ‚Äî institutionalizing "terms of use" as part of the product.

events.title: Shift in science: knowledge assessment/validation becomes agent-based and "execution-grounded"
events.description: Shift in science: knowledge assessment/validation becomes agentic and execution-grounded. Frameworks for agentic evaluation of deep research (DREAM), execution-grounded evaluation of mechanistic interpretation (MechEvalAgent), and benchmarks for report logic (ReportLogic) emerge ‚Äî institutional strengthening of reproducibility/audit.

events.title: "Closed loop" (Act-Verify-Refine) and formal specification are becoming mainstream in agent engineering
events.description: The "Closed Loop" (Act‚ÄëVerify‚ÄëRefine) and formal specification are becoming mainstream in agent engineering. APF/AJD, TAPE, vibe‚Äëcoding with formal constraints (FCL) represent a methodological shift from "ask‚Äëreceive" to "ask‚Äëexecute‚Äëverify‚Äërefine."

events.title: Metrics and tools for controlling hallucinations/quality are becoming an "integrated part" of the pipeline
events.description: Metrics and tools for hallucination/quality control are becoming an "integrated part" of the pipeline. Spilled Energy (logit metrics without training), FineRef (self-reflection based on references), ReportLogic/DREAM ‚Äî technologization of quality as a production process.

events.title: Acceleration of the "hardware" stack through LLM optimization of compilation/kernels
events.description: Acceleration of the "hardware" stack through LLM optimization of compilation/cores. K‚ÄëSearch for GPU kernels and IntOpt for IR optimizations demonstrate that LLM agents are beginning to enhance infrastructure performance, not just write application code.

events.title: Vertical integration ‚Äúmodel‚Üítool‚Üíreplacement of legacy competencies‚Äù hits incumbent suppliers
events.description: Vertical integration ‚Äúmodel‚Üítool‚Üíreplacement of legacy competencies‚Äù hits incumbent suppliers. Anthropic's statement about Cobol modernization triggers a reassessment of IBM; the market interprets this as a threat to service and platform rent.

events.title: M&A as an expansion of the customer base (service ecosystems), not just the AI core
events.description: M&A as an expansion of the customer base (service ecosystems), not just the AI core. Uber acquires SpotHero ‚Äî consolidation of consumer ‚Äúbehavioral‚Äù services, where AI will be a differentiator, but the deal is about channel/customer distribution.

events.title: The defense market draws AI companies into competitions on autonomy/swarms
events.description: The defense market draws AI companies into competitions for autonomy/swarms. SpaceX and xAI participate in a secret Pentagon contest on voice control and autonomous swarm drones ‚Äî expanding the chain ‚Äúfoundation model ‚Üí autonomous systems.‚Äù

events.title: Agent integration protocols for tools are crystallizing around schemas and MCP
events.description: Agent integration protocols for tools are crystallizing around schemas and MCP. The work on the convergence of Schema-Guided Dialogue and MCP captures the transformation of ‚Äútool use‚Äù into a deterministic/auditable layer.

events.title: The transition to ‚Äúphysical AI‚Äù reveals hidden manual labor and instability in supply chains
events.description: The shift to ‚Äúphysical AI‚Äù reveals hidden manual labor and instability in supply chains. The material on ‚Äúhidden human labor behind humanoid robots‚Äù signals that automation of the physical world still relies on labor at the periphery (annotation/telepresence/operators).

events.title: The infrastructural ‚Äúbottleneck‚Äù is shifting towards data center electrical systems
events.description: The infrastructural ‚Äúbottleneck‚Äù is shifting to data center electrics. The growing demand for power-gear (network connection equipment) and record backlogs materialize the constraint ‚ÄúAI = energy + electrical engineering.‚Äù --- #### üü¢ Lower levels (3-2-1): basis and material conditions

events.title: The threat of "dequalification" of legacy development (Cobol/mainframes) is becoming a market fact
events.description: The threat of ‚Äúdisqualification‚Äù of legacy development (Cobol/mainframes) is becoming a market reality. Claude Code and Cobol modernization are forming a new role: ‚ÄúAI legacy modernizer‚Äù and re-evaluating the value of long-standing competencies.

events.title: Demand is emerging for "verification engineers of agent systems" (safety+security+spec)
events.description: Demand is emerging for ‚Äúagent system verification engineers‚Äù (safety+security+spec). Extensive research on tool orchestration, closed loops, and red-teaming of agent systems is crystallizing professions at the intersection of cybersecurity, QA, and ML.

events.title: AI data center construction is limited by power and network infrastructure placement
events.description: AI data center construction is constrained by power and network infrastructure for placement. The focus is shifting from "where to buy GPUs" to "where to connect to capacity," which enhances the role of regions with accessible networks/substations/electric equipment suppliers.

events.title: Tariff uncertainty is beginning to be perceived as a risk for AI buildout
events.description: Tariff uncertainty is beginning to be perceived as a risk for AI buildout. The industry talks about the need for tariff predictability for investments in AI ‚Äî spatially, this means a risk of increased supply chain costs for servers/components.

events.title: Energy and (implicitly) cooling/water become the fundamental limit to AI scaling
events.description: Energy and (implicitly) cooling/water become the fundamental limit to AI scaling. The news about the ‚Äúpower-gear windfall‚Äù is an indicator that the resource loop (power grids/generation) dictates the pace.

cross_level_links.title: Energy limitation (Level 1) ‚Üí infrastructure nodes (Level 2) ‚Üí reindustrialization of the "electric" sector (Level 4/5) ‚Üí repackaging AI as a CapEx story in financial markets (Level 9).
cross_level_links.description:
**Energy constraint (Level 1) ‚Üí infrastructure nodes (Level 2) ‚Üí reindustrialization of the ‚Äúelectric‚Äù sector (Level 4/5) ‚Üí repackaging AI as a CapEx story in financial markets (Level 9).**  
Data center demand creates backlogs on power equipment, which increases capital intensity and makes tariffs/trading policy a significant factor in planning.

cross_level_links.title: Capital market (Level 9) ‚Üí competition restructuring (Level 5) ‚Üí technological replacement of legacy (Level 4) ‚Üí shift in professions (Level 3).
cross_level_links.description:
**Capital market (Level 9) ‚Üí competition restructuring (Level 5) ‚Üí technological replacement of legacy (Level 4) ‚Üí shift in professions (Level 3).**  
The ‚ÄúAI scare trade‚Äù and IBM‚Äôs decline amid the Cobol narrative accelerate the redistribution of expectations: where previously the ‚Äúmainframe integrator‚Äù was valued, now the ‚Äúmodel + modernization tool‚Äù is valued.

cross_level_links.title: Regulatory incidents (Lvl.7/8) ‚Üí requirements for engineering practices (Lvl.6/4) ‚Üí new specialization of companies and roles (Lvl.5/3).
cross_level_links.description:
**Regulatory incidents (Lvl.7/8) ‚Üí requirements for engineering practices (Lvl.6/4) ‚Üí new specialization of companies and roles (Lvl.5/3).**  
The OpenAI challenge in Canada and Anthropic's defense negotiations on guardrails are increasing demand for formalizable protocols of tools/constraints (MCP/schemes) and closed execution loops (TAPE/APF). --- ###

structural_shifts.title: "From AI as a product ‚Üí to AI as a tax-social management object"
structural_shifts.from: AI as a driver of profits for individual firms and a "growth story".
structural_shifts.to: AI as a source of redistributable rent (windfall) and an object of fiscal policy (AI tax) to compensate employment.

structural_shifts.title: "From 'chatbots' ‚Üí to agent loop engineering with verification"
structural_shifts.from: text/code generation as a single act.
structural_shifts.to: production loops: tool orchestration + schemes (MCP) + external solvers/verifiers + AVR/Act-Verify-Refine.

structural_shifts.title: "Legacy software as a vulnerable layer of CRT: models attack maintenance rent"
structural_shifts.from: persistent rents on old languages/platforms (Cobol on IBM).
structural_shifts.to: accelerated conversion of legacy code by agents and reduction of migration barriers.

radar_signals.title: Fiscal experiments around AI rent
radar_signals.description: (windfall/incremental gains). If the topic is established in OECD/national budgets, it will change the incentives for implementation and the structure of investments.

radar_signals.title: Regulatory classification of ‚Äúmodel extraction / distillation‚Äù as economic espionage.
radar_signals.description: Anthropic's statements about DeepSeek/MiniMax are a template for sanctions/legal regimes.

radar_signals.title: "LLM optimizes GPU kernels/compilers"
radar_signals.description: (K-Search, IntOpt): if it becomes established, it will reduce the TCO of training/inference and redistribute advantages between clouds/hardware/models.

radar_signals.title: Transition to scheme-controlled instrumentalization (MCP as the de facto standard).
radar_signals.description: This could become the "POSIX for agent systems," shifting competition towards ecosystems of compatibility.

radar_signals.title: Electrical bottlenecks in data centers (network connection) as the new "chip shortage 2.0."
radar_signals.description: Backlogs on power-gear can slow down AI expansion even with available GPUs.

radar_signals.title: Hidden human labor in ‚Äúphysical AI/robots‚Äù
radar_signals.description: ‚Äî reputational risk and cost risk (if the disclosure of the scale of human-in-the-loop becomes a public standard).

momentum_trends.name: Agent AI platforms (tool use, planning, orchestration)
momentum_trends.rationale: rapid growth of methodologies (TAPE, APF, orchestration) and interface standards (MCP). [Source](https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.19633) [Source](https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.19065) [Source](https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.18764)

momentum_trends.name: Security of AI agents (security/governance/redteaming autonomy)
momentum_trends.rationale: Empirical reports on failures of autonomous agents in "live" environments reinforce the demand for governance and security engineering. [Source](https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.20021)

momentum_trends.name: AI-CapEx / data center infrastructure
momentum_trends.rationale: Demand for network connection components is driving record orders and backlogs for electrical equipment manufacturers. [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-23/data-center-rush-spurs-earnings-windfall-for-power-gear-makers)

momentum_trends.name: Sovereign AI / geoeconomic delineation (US‚ÄìChina) through ‚Äúmodel extraction‚Äù
momentum_trends.rationale: Accusations of illicit extraction increase the likelihood of legal and trade barriers around models/data/access. [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-23/anthropic-says-deepseek-minimax-distilled-ai-models-for-gains)

momentum_trends.name: Closed API models as a "rental layer" (monetization through subscriptions)
momentum_trends.rationale: ‚ÄúQuitGPT‚Äù signals user fatigue with quality/behavior and the risk of churn in the absence of demonstrable utility. [Source](https://www.technologyreview.com/2026/02/10/1132577/a-quitgpt-campaign-is-urging-people-to-cancel-chatgpt-subscriptions/)

momentum_trends.name: "AI Tax" and Fiscal Redistributive Policy Around AI
momentum_trends.rationale: So far, this is the discourse of analysts/investors, but it is already shaping expectations and the language of policy (windfall). [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-24/citrini-report-author-calls-for-ai-tax-after-scare-trade-selloff)

momentum_trends.name: Legacy modernization (Cobol, etc.) as a key market for LLM implementation
momentum_trends.rationale: The impact of a single statement by Anthropic on IBM's market capitalization shows that the market believes in the rapid replacement/reassembly of the value chain. [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-23/ibm-shares-plunge-as-anthropic-touts-cobol-modernization-efforts)

momentum_trends.name: Classic SaaS (especially "non-differentiated")
momentum_trends.rationale: ‚ÄúScare trade‚Äù and warnings about bankruptcies/volatility in software reflect expectations of margin and value erosion. [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-23/black-swan-s-taleb-warns-on-software-bankruptcies-more-volatility) [Source](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2026-02-23/software-payments-shares-tumble-after-citrini-post-on-ai-risks)

momentum_trends.name: AI as a profit driver for individual companies and a ‚Äúgrowth story.‚Äù
momentum_trends.rationale: Fading: the transition from "AI as a driver of profits for individual firms and a 'growth story'" to "AI as a source of redistributable rent (windfall) and an object of fiscal policy (AI tax) to compensate for employment." Mentions in the context of the transition: 1

momentum_trends.name: text/code generation as a single act.
momentum_trends.rationale: Fading out: the transition from "text/code generation as a single act" to "production loops: tool orchestration + schemas (MCP) + external solvers/verifiers + AVR/Act-Verify-Refine." Mentions in the context of the transition: 1

momentum_trends.name: Stable rents on old languages/platforms (Cobol on IBM).
momentum_trends.rationale: Fading: the transition from "stable rents on old languages/platforms (Cobol on IBM)" to "accelerated conversion of legacy code by agents and reduction of migration barriers." Mentions in the context of transition: 1
